name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submissions
When a netizen used Baidu's Wenxin Yiyan test, he found that as long as the question contained Wei Zexi, the same sentence would be repeated

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On March 12, a junior high school student in Handan City suddenly fell to the ground and died while being punished to stand. The child’s father questioned the lack of timely rescue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens tested on Bilibili and found that typing the lyrics of the national anthem in the comment area would be blocked by the system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 18, according to the Korean Central News Agency, in order to fight against the United States, the number of people signing up to join the army or demobilize is increasing across North Korea. Statistics show that on the 17th alone, more than 800,000 Youth League cadres and young students across the country signed up to join the army or demobilize.
